1.「……ククク。そうだったのか。| この修行をこなすとは やはり| お前は ポルフ: .... Yes, it was. You are Por Juan's brother|after all.

2.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。| 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだな: I used to be his disciple. Your brother, if|you will.

3.「知ってるか？ <pc>。| この修行をこなした奴だけが| 伝説の旅芸人に 近づ: You know what? Only those who complete this|training can come close to becoming a|legendary traveling performer.

4.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。| あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時において: I'm done with my training. I gave you the|win then, but at this moment, I'd say you|and I are evenly matched.

Ha-ha-ha! Nothing can stop me! I will become|the most powerful, the most feared, the most|legendary traveling entertainer in the|
|world!

6.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような| ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！|: Kill those traveling dunces who are content|just to make people laugh! I'll show the|world that tricks don't work!

7.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。: ... I save people with my tricks.
